DOC.brief_summary: The effect 16-week exercise training program insulin resistance adiposity overweight/obese woman Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Overweight Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Young , overweight/obese woman PCOS along age BMI-matched healthy control without PCOS enrol study . Participants assessment body composition ( DEXA ) , visceral ectopic fat ( MR ) , ovarian parameter ( follicle size number , MRI ) insulin sensitivity ( euglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp ) , interstitial lipolysis ( microdialysis ) , whole body lipolysis glycolysis ( stable isotope ) , aerobic fitness ( VO2max test ) fat biopsy perform across two clinic visit ( 1 outpatient visit , 1 overnight stay ) . Participants control group undergo assessment , whereas participant PCOS Group assessments twice , baseline follow 16 week supervise aerobic exercise program . Throughout exercise program body weight measured weekly menstrual cycle frequency document calendar . Additionally , vital sign , weight , waist hip circumference measure fast blood sample collect every 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Women age 1830 , inclusive . BMI great equal 25 . Sedentary lifestyle currently exercise 60 minute per week . A medical diagnosis polycystic ovary syndrome . The diagnosis compare recent international criteria1 . Together irregular menses ( few 6 cycle per year ) , participant must also least one follow characteristic ; 1. presence polycystic ovary transvaginal ultrasound , > 10 cyst , 28 mm diameter ( ultrasound do study however ; ultrasound report use available ) and/or 2. clinical manifestation ( hirsutism ) examine PI screen visit biochemical evidence ( elevate testosterone free androgen index ) hyperandrogenism , determine fast blood sample collect screening visit . Women enrol nonPCOS control group require regular menstrual cycle ( one cycle per month ) . Individuals history cardiovascular disease elevate blood pressure 160/90 mmHg . Individuals history Diabetes ( Type 1 Type 2 ) . Individuals history Kidney , Liver Heart disease . Individuals untreated thyroid disease . Individuals smoke . Individuals exercise 60 minute per week . Individuals use medication include contraceptive ( medication use treat thyroid disease permit ) . Individuals alcoholism substance abuse . Individuals pregnant lactating ( breast feeding ) . Individuals become pregnant throughout study exclude . Individuals try become pregnant . Control subject exclude irregular menses ( few 1 cycle per month ) . Unable complete approximately 60 minute medium intensity exercise per day ( 5 day per week ) Pennington Health Fitness Center ( PCOS Group Only ) .
